meanings.definition: The practice of writing and submitting grant proposals.
meanings.sent1: Her grantsmanship improved after attending a workshop on proposal writing.
meanings.sent2: She excelled in grantsmanship by carefully crafting each grant application.
meanings.sent3: The professor's grantsmanship was so good, he could write a proposal in his sleep!
meanings.sent4: His grantsmanship was a key that unlocked doors to funding opportunities.
meanings.sent5: Through dedicated grantsmanship, she secured funds for the community center.

meanings.definition: The skill or expertise in securing funding through grants.
meanings.sent1: His grantsmanship helped the organization receive much-needed financial support.
meanings.sent2: Developing strong relationships is crucial in mastering grantsmanship.
meanings.sent3: The team's grantsmanship was so impressive, they could fundraise with their eyes closed!
meanings.sent4: Her grantsmanship shone brightly in the competitive world of grant applications.
meanings.sent5: With his exceptional grantsmanship, he turned ideas into funded projects.
